name: Beer Batter Fish Made Great
author: Linda Olar
summary: This is a great beer batter fish recipe, and is very easy to do. We often fish all day with friends, and then cook the fish afterwards out on deck. Yummy and great!
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
directions: Heat oil in a deep fryer to 365 degrees F (185 degrees C)
Rinse fish, pat dry, and season with salt and pepper
Combine flour, garlic powder, paprika, 2 teaspoons salt, and 2 teaspoons pepper
Gradually mix in beer until a thin batter is formed
You should be able to see the fish through the batter after it has been dipped
Dip fish fillets into the batter, then drop one at a time into hot oil
Fry fish, turning once, until both sides are golden brown
Drain on paper towels, and serve warm
